1.title: The Haunted Edison Hotel
1.plot: In their Season 8 opener the Detectives visit Sunbury PA and the Historic Hotel Edison. Here they look to discover the source of the claims of activity in this hotel in the heart of the coal regions of PA.

2.title: The Haunted Scott's Family Resort Part 1
2.plot: Our 100th Episode has the Detectives investigating Scott's Family Resort in Deposit NY.

3.title: Scott's Family Resort Part 2"The Conclusion"
3.plot: The Conclusion to the Detectives 100th Episode investigating the Paranormal Activity at Scott's Family Resort in Deposit PA.

4.title: The Haunted Sorrento's Winery and Cherry Valley Vinyards
4.plot: The detectives investigate Sorrento's Winery Saylorsburg PA (Air date 11-11-2017) The detectives stay local and travel to the Poconos where they investigate the reports of haunting from the fire that destroyed the barn to the Indian settlement in the area.

5.title: The Haunted Bolton Mansion, Levittown PA
5.plot: The Haunted Bolton Mansion Levittown PA (Air Date 12/2/2017) The Detectives investigate the reports of activity in the historic mansion...What activity well...according to their website: Examples: "...pictures flying off walls, heavy "boot" footsteps on the main floor even when motion detector alarm was on, a garland floating in air for several seconds before being thrown at individuals and from a mantle, several heavy, old windows going up and down on their own, "sleep paralysis" situations where the same individual was actually dragged off of the bed by his ankles, ...

6.title: The Haunted Hanover Green Cemetery
6.plot: The Detectives return to the location of a Season 1 investigation of The Hanover Green Cemetery and once again this location provided plenty in the way of activity and experience for the Team.

7.title: The Haunted Iron Island Museum
7.plot: The Detectives travel to Buffalo New York to investigate the famous Iron Island Museum with reports of Mary in the basement the kids in the upstairs room...the spirits of the veterans whom the museum insured would have a proper burial...This was a fantastic historical experience and provided much activity and shocking experiences for both Frank and Rich.

1.title: The Muncy PA War Musuem
1.plot: NEPA Paranormal kick off their first episode of the Ghost Detectives by investigating the claims of the War Museum in Muncy Pennsylvania...Join the team on their first journey of television into the realm of the Paranormal.

2.title: 'Trolley Museum', Scranton, PA
2.plot: The Ghost Detectives team travels North to Scranton and investigates claims of Paranormal Activity at the Trolley Museum adjacent to the Historical Steamtown National Park.

3.title: 'The Jim Thorpe Inn' Jim Thorpe, PA
3.plot: The Team travels to Jim Thorpe and investigates haunting reports of Paranormal Activity at the historic Jim Thorpe Inn.

4.title: Mark Nesbitts 'Ghost of Gettysburg Home"
4.plot: Ghost Detectives investigates Mark Nesbitt's "Ghost of Gettysburg" home.

5.title: Gettysburg Jenny Wade House & Orphanage
5.plot: Ghost Detectives finishes up its trip to Gettysburg investigating the Jenny Wade home and the infamous "Orphanage.

6.title: The Cinema & Draft House
6.plot: Many claims of paranormal activity for the cinema and Draft House in Hazleton, Pennsylvania.

7.title: Hanover Green Cemetery
7.plot: Ghost Detectives investigates one of the oldest cemeteries in America, the Hanover green cemetery in Hanover, Pennsylvania.

8.title: Carbondale City Hall
8.plot: Filled with claims from the jail cells in the basement to the clock tower. Located in Carbondale, Pennsylvania, in the northeast corner of the state.

9.title: Tamaqua Elks Club
9.plot: Ghost Detectives visits Tamaqua Elks Club to seek out the spirits and learn more about this eerie landmark.

10.title: The Columns Museum Milford, Pennslyvania
10.plot: Ghost Detectives visits The Columns to try to catch some specters.

11.title: Columbia County Court House
11.plot: Ghost detectives investigates the Columbia County Court House in Bloomsburg, Pennsylvania. Some incredible action in the attic, which was constructed from wood from the gallows from the back of the building.

1.title: Studio 207
1.plot: The Ghost Detectives work with the Coal Region Paranormal Team investigating Studio 207 in Shamokin, Pennsylvania.

2.title: Allentown Symphony Hall
2.plot: Ghost Detectives investigates the Allentown Symphony Hall,watch as they try to find out who is still performing.

3.title: The Sweatland Home
3.plot: Ghost Detectives investigates one of the oldest homes in Wyoming Valley.

4.title: McGrath's Pub
4.plot: Ghost Detectives investigates McGraths pub with Dalton.

5.title: The Lake House: Part 1
5.plot: Ghost detectives investigates a haunted attraction in Saylorsburg, Pennsylvania for paranormal activity. The odd part is that the actors who are trying to scare the patrons, are getting scared themselves.

6.title: The Lake House: Part 2
6.plot: Actors at a haunted Halloween attraction are getting scared.

7.title: Broney's Inn
7.plot: Ghost Detectives investigates Broney's Tavern and Inn in Leighigh valley, Pennsylvania with Blue Mountain Paranormal

8.title: The Red Mill
8.plot: The Ghost Detectives investigate The Red Mill in Clinton, New Jersey.

9.title: The Mansion House: Part 1
9.plot: The team investigates the Mansion House in Kresgeville, Pennsylvania, an old bed & breakfast that has been around since the 1800's. Find out who hasn't left their room.

11.title: The Denesion House
11.plot: Ghost detectives investigates one of the oldest homes in Wyoming valley,Pa.

12.title: The Rock 'n' Roll Ranch
12.plot: Watch as the team investigate The Rock n Roll Ranch in Canidensus,Pa. as they try to make contact with a former owner.

13.title: The Second Street Pub
13.plot: Ghost Detectives investigates a biker bar were former patrons may still come in for a drink,see if the ghost detectives discover anything from the other side.

14.title: The Selma Mansion: Part 1
14.plot: The team investigates the Selma Mansion Norisstown, Pennsylvania. The team captures some great EVP's and a door shutting.

15.title: The Selma Mansion: Part 2
15.plot: The team investigates the Selma Mansion Norisstown, Pennsylvania. The team captures some great EVP's and a door shutting.

1.title: Admiral Fell Inn
1.plot: Ghost Detectives investigates the legendary Admiral Fell Inn Baltimore, Maryland for paranormal activity.

2.title: Edgar Allen Poe House
2.plot: Ghost Detectives investigates the Edgar Allen Poe house in Baltimore MD. One of the only paranormal groups to be granted access to this amazing place. See if the spirit of this incredible writer is still at his home.

3.title: Burn Brea Mansion
3.plot: Ghost Detectives investigates Burn Brea Mansion in Glen Spay, New York.

4.title: The Overlook
4.plot: The team investigate The Overlook, Pennsylvania.

5.title: The Hibernian House
5.plot: Ghost Detectives investigates The Hiberian House in Girardville, Pennsylvania.

6.title: The Augustine Inn
6.plot: The team investigates the Augustine Inn in Delaware, located right on the Delaware river.

7.title: Daniels Top O the Poconos
7.plot: The Team investigates Daniel's Top O the Poconos in the Pocono mountains, Pennsylvania.

8.title: The Dimmick Inn
8.plot: The Ghost Detectives investigates the historic Dimmick Inn in Milford, Pennsylvania.

9.title: The David Stewart Farm
9.plot: The team goes to Gettysburg Pa. to investigate the David Stewart Farm. A confederate hospital during the civil war,this investigation did not disappoint anyone,from the haunted barn to the make shift operating room.

10.title: The Mahanoy City Elks Club
10.plot: Ghost Detectives investigate the Elks club in Mahanoy city, Pennsylvania.

11.title: The Garrison House
11.plot: The team goes to West Point, New York, to investigate a very haunted Bed & Breakfast.

12.title: The Cuneen Hackett Theater
12.plot: The ghost detectives investigate The Cuneen Hackett Theater and administration building in Poughkeepsie, New York.

13.title: The Burlington Library: Part 1
13.plot: All paranormal investigators have something about investigating a library, could be because of the famous movie. The Burlington Library is located Burlington, NJ as the Ghost Detectives investigate with South Jersey Ghost Research, full body apparitions are a common occurrence.

14.title: The Burlington Library: Part 2
14.plot: All paranormal investigators have something about investigating a library, could be because of the famous movie. The Burlington Library is located Burlington, NJ as the Ghost Detectives investigate with South Jersey Ghost Research, full body apparitions are a common occurrence.

15.title: The Shanley Hotel
15.plot: The Team Investigates the famous Shanley Hotel.The Shanley is a haunted inn located in Napanoch, New York.

16.title: Penns's Tavern
16.plot: The Team Investigates Penn's Tavern outside of Sunbury PA. The Ghost Detectives are joined by the Spirit Reachers to investigate this historic location.

1.title: The Sun Inn
1.plot: Join the ghost detectives as they kick off season 4 with the Sun Inn in Bethlehem ,Pa SPECIAL GUEST INVESTIGATORS--Sona Paranormal and Steelwire Ent.

2.title: The Haunted Phoenix Performing Art Center
2.plot: The Ghost Detectives stay local and visit Duryea PA and the Phoenix Preforming Arts Center to investigate reports of unexplained and possibly Paranormal Phenomenon.

3.title: The Ghost Detectives Visit Rolling Hills Asylum
3.plot: Ghost Detectives traveled for an incredible investigation at Rolling Hills Asylum.Thank you Sharon Coyle for making it possible. Our investigation and episode is dedicated by the Ghost Detectives in loving memory of Jason Jewett, Rest in Peace our Friend/

4.title: Ghost Detectives a Night at Rolling Hills Asylum-Part 2
4.plot: A continuation of this incredible investigation at Rolling Hills Asylum.

5.title: The Haunted Wayne Hotel
5.plot: The Ghost Detectives investigates the haunted Wayne Hotel in Honesdale,pa. Watch as the team spends a couple of nights in this extremely haunted hotel.

6.title: The Haunting of Sarah at Mansfield University of Pennsylvania North Hall
6.plot: The Ghost Detectives join up again with CRPT (Coal Region Paranormal Team) to investigate the legend of "Sarah" at Mansfield College.

7.title: The Ghost Detectives Visit the Irish Mist Pub in Troy NY
7.plot: The Ghost Detectives in another Paraunity Episode team up with GUEST INVESTIGATORS from the Glory Haunt Hounds to investigate the Irish Mist Pub in Troy NY.

8.title: The Ghost Detectives Investigate Elaine's Bed and Breakfast
8.plot: The Ghost Detectives Investigate this haunted bed and Breakfast in Cape May NJ along with GUEST INVESTIGATORS from SPRE.

9.title: The Ghost Detectives at the Campus Theater in Lewisburg PA
9.plot: The team investigates the historic and haunted Theater in Lewisburg PA along with special guests Medium Cathy Meriaux and from WVIA TV Kathyrne Davies.

10.title: The Ghost Detectives Visit Gettysburg and Investigate the Mickley Farm
10.plot: The Detectives visit Gettysburg PA and the Mickley Farm to investigate reports of Paranormal activity.

11.title: The Haunted Hillview Manor
11.plot: Season 4 Finale did not disappoint with lots of evidence and a few "entertaining" moments for the team.

1.title: The Market Place
1.plot: The Ghost Detectives open with an investigation in he Columbia Market House to find if the claims of Paranormal activity.

2.title: The GAR Museum--Part 1
2.plot: The Ghost Detectives joins again with the South Jersey Ghost Research Team in a Paraunity investigation of the reported paranormal activity at the GAR Museum.

3.title: The GAR Museum--Part 2
3.plot: The Ghost Detectives joins again with the South Jersey Ghost Research Team in a Paraunity investigation of the reported paranormal activity at the GAR Museum.

4.title: The Ghost Detectives Visit the Palmyra Museum Phelps General Store-Part 1
4.plot: The Team travels to Palmyra New York and joins with the Seeking Shadows Paranormal in a Paraunity Investigation of the Phelps General store.

5.title: The Ghost Detectives Visit the Palmyra Museum Phelps General Store-Part 2
5.plot: The Team travels to Palmyra New York and joins with the Seeking Shadows Paranormal in a Paraunity Investigation of the Phelps General store.

6.title: The Ghost Detectives with the Coal Region Paranormal Team Investigate the Montour County Court House
6.plot: In another Paraunity Investigation the Ghost Detectives join back up with CRPT (Coal Region Paranormal Team) in an investigation of the Montour County Court House.

7.title: The Ghost Detectives at the Hendle House, Reading PA
7.plot: The Ghost Detectives joined with S.P.I.R.I.T. Paranormal in a Paraunity investigation of the historic Hendel House in Reading PA.

8.title: The Tom X
8.plot: The Team investigates the legend of Tom Mix and the paranormal activity reported at the "Tom X" Pub.

9.title: The Haunted Priestley-Forsyth Library
9.plot: The Ghost Detectives and Spirit Reachers joined together in the Paraunity investigation of the historic (and haunted) Priestley-Forsyth Library.

1.title: The White Hill Mansion
1.plot: The Ghost Detectives begin by heading out to White Hill Mansion, Fieldsboro, NJ to investigate the multiple claims of activity at this historic location.

2.title: Jennie Wade House, Gettysburg
2.plot: The Ghost Detectives return to Gettysburg and the location of one of their First Season episodes-The Jennie Wade House" in an effort to validate some of the evidence the captured in 2011...and did they get more than they bargained for.

3.title: The Ship Inn
3.plot: The Ghost Detectives Travel to "the Ship Inn" located in Exton PA outside West Chester, PA joining the Ghost Detectives were members of SPRE Paranormal .

4.title: The Ghost Detectives Visit the "Keith House" at Greame Park
4.plot: The Ghost Detectives traveled to Horsham PA to investigate the Keith House t Greame Park. with claims of the ghost of "Maggie" Graeme, another that may be her husband, and a servant without a head this location did not disappoint.

5.title: Shawnee Inn and Resort
5.plot: The Ghost Detectives arrived in the Poconos to investigate the "Shawnee Inn and Resort" with reports of a ghostly woman, disembodied whispers and other happenings. In this Paraunity episode members of CORE Paranormal Research joined the team.

6.title: The Ghost Detectives Return to Gettysburg and the Battlefield Brew House,
6.plot: The Ghost Detectives, return to Gettysburg to investigate The "Battlefield Brew House" the scene of one of the largest field hospitals during the three day battle. This investigation features a portal session the MUST be heard to believe.

7.title: The Ghost Detectives Check Into Miss Fanny's Victorian Party House
7.plot: In a Paraunity Episode the team was joined by Ghost Magnets with a Twist as the Ghost Detectives investigated "Miss Fanny's Victorian Party House" near Fishkill NY. This case revealed some unusual experiences for all.

8.title: The Ghost Detectives Visit the Burrows Mansion
8.plot: The Ghost Detectives traveled to Matawan, NJ but not to investigate for "Jaws" instead in a Paraunity investigation the team along with the NJ Ghost Organizstion investigated the multitude of claims at Burrow Mansion.

9.title: The Haldeman Mansion
9.plot: In another Paraunity episode the team joined with R.I.P (Researchers in Paranormal) to investigated the historical and very haunted Haldeman Mansion in Bainbridge, PA.

10.title: The Tillie Pierce, Gettysburg PA
10.plot: The Ghost Detectives journeyed again to Gettysburg to investigate one of the several historic and reportedly haunted locations in this town...The Tillie Pierce Inn...by the evidence haunted is an understatement.

11.title: The Knickerbocker Hotel
11.plot: The Ghost Detectives ended season 6 with a trip to Linesville PA and the Knickerbocker Hotel. This location and this investigation has become many of our teams favorite because of the activity captured from the basement to the top floor.

1.title: The Ghost Detectives at the Berwick Theater and Center for Community Arts
1.plot: Season 7 opens with The Detectives investigating the Berwick Theater and Center for Community Arts in Berwick along with their old friends from the Coal Region Paranormal Team (CRPT). Watch as the team searches to determine if and who still attends the shows at the theater...long after they left this realm.

2.title: The Lord Baltimore Hotel Part 1
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: The Lord Baltimore Hotel, Part 2
3.plot: Part 2 of the Detectives trip to Baltimore Maryland to investigate the Historic Lord Baltimore Hotel - The team spent the weekend finding who may have checked in....and never checked out.

4.title: The David Steward Farm
4.plot: In this episode the team investigates the historic David Steward Farm in Gettysburg PA. This hundred acre farm was one of the largest hospitals for the wounded and dying during the civil war.

5.title: Big Foot Episode
5.plot: This week the Detectives traveled to Fayette County PA to look for the elusive Bigfoot.

6.title: Pennhurst State School and Hospital
6.plot: During this episode the Detectives journey to Spring City Pennsylvania to investigate the Mayflower and Devon Buildings at Pennhurst State School and Hospital.

7.title: The Kitty Knght Inn
7.plot: The Detectives travel to Georgetown Maryland to investigate the Historic Kitty Knight Inn.

imdb.plot outline: Every town has their ghost stories. From the creepy house on the hill to the urban legend of the woman in white... A paranormal team from Northeast Pennsylvania, started by and includes many family members, seek out claims of ghosts, monsters, demons and poltergeists. Through use of history, equipment and senses, they investigate these claims intent on getting to the truth. While working full-time, the team founder and leader builds his own equipment for the team to use along with use of equipment already well known in the field along with keeping up with daily demands. The team's co-founder, the daughter of the leader, balances daily life along with lining up locations, accommodations, contacting the media and other aspects of marketing. She is also an investigator. There is a unique dynamic to the team consisting of members from all backgrounds who bring their own strengths weekly to the show, including a demonologist, archaeologist and case workers in the justice system. Many members have some level of sensitivity to the paranormal as well. The team members hold many different religious views and beliefs so they are able to approach a situation with many theories the all may or may not agree on. Each episode brings new adventures and paranormal stories. The team works with many guest stars as well as local teams familiar with a specific location.
imdb.title: Ghost Detectives
plot: Northeastern and Central Pennsylvania's only paranormal reality show. Join the team as they investigate claims of paranormal activity in haunted locations on the East Coast.::BC

Every town has their ghost stories. From the creepy house on the hill to the urban legend of the woman in white... A paranormal team from Northeast Pennsylvania, started by and includes many family members, seek out claims of ghosts, monsters, demons and poltergeists. Through use of history, equipment and senses, they investigate these claims intent on getting to the truth. While working full-time, the team founder and leader builds his own equipment for the team to use along with use of equipment already well known in the field along with keeping up with daily demands. The team's co-founder, the daughter of the leader, balances daily life along with lining up locations, accommodations, contacting the media and other aspects of marketing. She is also an investigator. There is a unique dynamic to the team consisting of members from all backgrounds who bring their own strengths weekly to the show, including a demonologist, archaeologist and case workers in the justice system. Many members have some level of sensitivity to the paranormal as well. The team members hold many different religious views and beliefs so they are able to approach a situation with many theories the all may or may not agree on.
